content.title: Introduction
content: CHITUBOX Basic is a free 3D printing software (slicer) that slices and converts 3D mesh files into printable files. It aims to make 3D printing easier and more efficient, by simplifying the entire 3D printing process, allowing users to quickly and easily convert 3D models into 3D printed parts. The software supports a variety of 3D printing machines and profiles and offers a rich set of options for optimizing 3d print models.
